text: 2. (5 points) Use induction on i to prove the following claim: Claim: Let ay,as,...,a, be the sequence of distinct numbers in array p[l..n]. Then for any i,1 < i < n, GENERATE-ALL-PERMUTATIONS(p[1..n], i) returns exactly the i! permutations in the set permUt({a'l! ag,... )ai}y Qi1 Aig2y - - - ,a,.).
